1. Run PSN Stuff. Find a game or DLC you like and download both the .pkg file and the .rap (crack) file

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Quick guide, more detailed info in torrent.


PSN stuff by LoOzers and Slimshady451 - Free PSN Downloads and Cracks Application




Step1: Download Psn Stuff Application and Run it

Step2: Choose What Game u would Like in the program

Step3: Click Save Rap (crack), Then Click Download Packages

Step4: After That go Back To Where u downloaded The Program and there will be 2 folders

Step5: 1 Folder Called exdata and 2nd Folder called pkg

Step6: Inside the exdata will be the rap (crack) and inside the pkg will be the .pkg (game) you need to install

Step7: After That insert Usb into pc and make a folder called exdata

Step8: inside the exdata folder put the .rap file u downloaded from the program in there (the game)

Step9: Put the game .pkg on the root of the usb (not in a folder)

Step10: Run PSNpatch

Step11: Press L1 or R1

Step12: install the .pkg files u downloaded 

Step13: Boom The Game should Load And You Can play it!!!!!
